TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_sslalu’, title = sslalu’, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/sslalu’} }

S.FORM: sslalu' gaga' na sslalu' Tayal hya' ga, syun naha' glaing lalu' na laqi' hru 'buzyan naha' lalu' na yaba' naha' tay suruw, gi yasa qu blaq slpuw musa' tay yatux.
sslalo' gaga' na sslalo' Tayal hya' ga, syon naha' glaing lalo' na laqi' hro 'bozyan naha' lalo' na yaba' naha' tay sorow, gi yasa qo blaq slpow mosa' tay yatox.
